snippet: The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said that Graco had until March 20 to explain why the recall of 3.8 million child seats last month did not include infant seats.
abstract: National Highway Traffic Safety Administration orders child seat maker Graco to explain why recall of 3.8 million child seats with faulty buckles did not include 1.8 million infant seats that have the same buckles.
lead_paragraph: The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said that Graco had until March 20 to explain why the recall of 3.8 million child seats last month did not include infant seats.

headline.main: U.S. Orders Seat Maker to Explain Recent Recall
headline.print_headline: U.S. Orders Car-Seat Maker to Explain Recall
